TITLE: Shady Part of Me
DESCRIPTION: Shady Part of Me is a narrative puzzle game. It tells the story of a little girl, frightened by the light, and her shadow. Together, they try to get out of the dreamlike world in which they are locked.

TITLE: Harold Halibut
DESCRIPTION: Dive into this nautic adventure as curiosity will guide you through a space ship wreck on an unknown planet made up of water. When one of the lead scientists still on board tries to unriddle the possibility of a relaunch young Janitor Harold is around to assist her. Join Harold in his clumsy undertakings to stir up the ark-like ship‚Äôs stale day-to-day life and find the secrets that lie behind its doors.

TITLE: The Last Case of Benedict Fox
DESCRIPTION: Descend into a limbo of decaying memories as Benedict Fox, a self-proclaimed detective bound to his demon companion. Use that unholy bond to explore the minds of the recently deceased in search of clues as you uncover the mysteries of a massive, decrepit mansion ‚Äî the site to a young couple's grisly murder, and the disappearance of their child. Immerse yourself in a dark, intriguing world full of secret organizations, forbidden rituals, and cold-blooded crimes in an arcane adventure brought to life through a fascinating Burton-esque art style.

TITLE: Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death (2013)
GENRE: Puzzle, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Adventure
DESCRIPTION: Marlow Briggs and the Mask of Death is a third person action hack and slasher that is perfect for the player who wants to experience a game that brings to life the best of blockbuster films, over the top action and cinematic gameplay and comic book heroes, with its focus on relentless high-octane combat, exotic danger filled environments and epic set pieces.

TITLE: 1979 Revolution: Black Friday (2016)
DESCRIPTION: 1979 Revolution, the action/adventure game, immerses players into the gritty, euphoric streets of revolution ‚Äì where the choices you make may betray you. Set in the actual events of 1979 Iran.

TITLE: Alan Wake
DESCRIPTION: Alan Wake is a psychological horror action-adventure game with a cinematic presentation, focusing on a writer battling darkness with light in a Pacific Northwest setting. It features episodic storytelling reminiscent of a TV series.

TITLE: Avowed
DESCRIPTION: Avowed is an upcoming first-person RPG from Obsidian Entertainment, set in the world of Eora. Expect deep world-building, impactful choices, and a focus on player agency in a fantasy setting.

TITLE: Broken Age
DESCRIPTION: Broken Age is a point-and-click adventure game with a hand-painted art style, telling the intertwined stories of a boy and a girl seeking to break free from their predetermined fates. It features charming characters and clever puzzles.

TITLE: Creatures of Ava
DESCRIPTION: Creatures of Ava is an action-adventure game set in a vibrant, mystical world, where you befriend and learn to play with the local wildlife. It combines exploration, creature interaction, and environmental puzzles.

TITLE: Cyberpunk 2077
DESCRIPTION: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the dark future of Night City. With stunning visuals and deep character customization, you navigate a city obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification as the mercenary V.

TITLE: Disco Elysium
DESCRIPTION: Disco Elysium is a revolutionary isometric RPG with a unique watercolor art style. Play as a detective with a troubled past, solving a complex case in a decaying city while grappling with personal demons and a deeply branching narrative.

TITLE: Firewatch
DESCRIPTION: Firewatch is a first-person mystery adventure game set in the Wyoming wilderness with a distinctive stylized art style. As a fire lookout, you uncover secrets and build relationships through walkie-talkie conversations, all while surrounded by a looming sense of isolation.

TITLE: Flintlock: Siege of the Dawn
DESCRIPTION: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn is an upcoming action-adventure RPG with a unique blend of flintlock fantasy and soulslike combat. Embark on a journey filled with mythical creatures and powerful gods in a world where magic and technology collide.

TITLE: Hauntii
DESCRIPTION: Hauntii is an action-adventure game with a striking hand-drawn art style, where players explore a haunted world as a ghost. Solve puzzles, possess characters, and unravel the mysteries of a spectral realm.

TITLE: Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess
DESCRIPTION: Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess is an upcoming action-adventure game with a distinct Japanese art style, blending action and strategy. Protect the goddess and purify the land from defilement in a visually stunning world.

TITLE: South Of Midnight
DESCRIPTION: South of Midnight is an upcoming action-adventure game with a unique stop-motion-inspired visual style, set in the American South. Explore a world steeped in folklore and confront mythical creatures in a coming-of-age story.

TITLE: The inner world
DESCRIPTION: The Inner World is a point-and-click adventure game with a charming, cartoonish art style. Solve quirky puzzles and explore a world inside-out, following the adventures of Robert as he uncovers the secrets of Asposia.

TITLE: The Rewinder
DESCRIPTION: The Rewinder is a pixel-art adventure game inspired by Chinese folklore. As a Rewinder, you can enter people's memories to alter the past and influence the present, solving mysteries and changing destinies.

TITLE: TUNIC
DESCRIPTION: TUNIC is an action-adventure game with an isometric perspective and a charming, retro-inspired art style. Explore a mysterious island as a small fox, battling challenging enemies and deciphering ancient secrets.

TITLE: Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice
DESCRIPTION: Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice is an action-adventure game with a dark and haunting atmosphere, exploring psychosis through the eyes of Senua, a Celtic warrior. It features stunning visuals and intense combat.

TITLE: ReCore: Definitive Edition
DESCRIPTION: ReCore: Definitive Edition is an action-adventure game with a vibrant, post-apocalyptic setting. As Joule Adams, explore a world with robotic companions, solve puzzles, and engage in fast-paced combat.

TITLE: Senua's Saga Hellblade 2
DESCRIPTION: Senua's Saga: Hellblade II is an action-adventure game with breathtaking visuals and a focus on psychological horror. Continue Senua's journey through the Viking age, battling inner demons and external threats with visceral combat.

TITLE: Starfield
DESCRIPTION: Starfield is an action RPG set in the vast expanse of space, developed by Bethesda Game Studios. Explore countless planets, customize your character, and embark on an epic journey through the stars with stunning graphics.

TITLE: Fe
DESCRIPTION: Fe is an action-adventure game with a unique, wordless storytelling approach and a beautiful, stylized art style. Explore a Nordic forest as a small creature, interacting with the environment and other animals through sound and movement.

TITLE: Gris
DESCRIPTION: Gris is a platform-adventure game with a breathtaking watercolor art style, telling a poignant story of a young girl's journey through sorrow. Solve environmental puzzles and navigate surreal landscapes in this visually stunning experience.

TITLE: Jusant
DESCRIPTION: Jusant is a puzzle game with a serene and minimalist art style, where players climb a towering, desolate tower. Solve environmental puzzles and uncover the history of a fallen civilization in this atmospheric climbing adventure.

TITLE: Planet of Lana
DESCRIPTION: Planet of Lana is an adventure game with a hand-painted art style, set on a beautiful and mysterious alien world. Guide Lana and her animal companion through dangerous landscapes, solving puzzles and evading robotic enemies.

TITLE: Spirit of the North: Enhanced Edition
DESCRIPTION: Spirit of the North: Enhanced Edition is a single-player adventure game inspired by the landscapes of Iceland, featuring a wordless narrative and a focus on atmosphere and exploration as a regular fox intertwined with a magical spirit.

TITLE: Dragon Age: The Veilguard
DESCRIPTION: Dragon Age: The Veilguard is an upcoming RPG set in the Dragon Age universe, promising a character-driven narrative with a diverse cast of companions. Expect tactical combat, deep lore, and impactful choices in a high-fantasy setting.

TITLE: Dragon Age: Inquisition
DESCRIPTION: Dragon Age: Inquisition is an action RPG with a vast open world and a focus on tactical combat. As the Inquisitor, lead a team of diverse characters to save Thedas from a demonic threat, making impactful choices that shape the world.

TITLE: Nine Sols
DESCRIPTION: Nine Sols is an action RPG - Soulslike game with a unique blend of Taiwanese Taoism and cyberpunk elements. Explore a hand-drawn world, battle challenging enemies, and uncover the secrets of an ancient civilization.

TITLE: The Outer Worlds
DESCRIPTION: The Outer Worlds is an action RPG with a retro-futuristic art style, set in a colony far from Earth. Explore a vibrant world, make impactful choices, and build a crew of quirky characters in this darkly humorous adventure.

TITLE: We Happy Few
DESCRIPTION: We Happy Few is an action-adventure game set in a dystopian English city in the 1960s with a striking, stylized art style. As one of the 'Downers' trying to escape, navigate a society dependent on a happiness-inducing drug, and uncover dark secrets.

TITLE: The Wandering Village
DESCRIPTION: The Wandering Village is a city-building simulation game with a unique concept: build a village on the back of a giant, wandering creature. Manage resources, research technologies, and form a symbiotic relationship with your host in a beautifully realized world.

TITLE: As Dusk Falls
DESCRIPTION: As Dusk Falls is an interactive drama adventure game with a distinctive rotoscoped art style. Explore the intertwined lives of two families across decades, making impactful choices that determine their fates in this gripping narrative.
